title: RobertGudsin
author: RobertGudsin
content: I'm fairly new here , but I don't know who or what else to ask as ive been stuck in panic mode ... I'm losing my home today and considering my car was towed a month ago I'm definitely about to be on my own literally. I don't have many family members never have my whole life so I cannot turn to them . I'm asking if anyone can lend me 20-30 dollars to get me an Uber after I get evicted . I can surely pay it back within 2-3 days I'll give you all my info as in my driver's license my address all of it to assure you I'm legit .

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: RobertGudsin on December 11, 2022, 03:13:10 PMI'm asking if anyone can lend me 20-30 dollars to get me an Uber after I get evicted . I do not mean to be insensitive, but if you are on a budget and cannot afford Uber, why not take public transportation? Or walk, like Timelord2067 suggested. It is good for your health.Quote from: RobertGudsin on December 11, 2022, 03:13:10 PMI can surely pay it back within 2-3 days I'll give you all my info as in my driver's license my address all of it to assure you I'm legit . Surely? I am not so sure. Your credit score is pretty bad. Considering that you will be evicted, that your car is impounded, and all that...Quote from: RobertGudsin on December 11, 2022, 03:13:10 PMI'll give you all my info as in my driver's license my address all of it to assure you I'm legit . What good is that?

comments.author: Ludmilla_rose1995
comments.body: Quote from: RobertGudsin on December 11, 2022, 03:13:10 PMI'm fairly new here , but I don't know who or what else to ask as ive been stuck in panic mode ... I'm losing my home today and considering my car was towed a month ago I'm definitely about to be on my own literally. I don't have many family members never have my whole life so I cannot turn to them . I'm asking if anyone can lend me 20-30 dollars to get me an Uber after I get evicted . I can surely pay it back within 2-3 days I'll give you all my info as in my driver's license my address all of it to assure you I'm legit . because you are a newbie, I can only give you encouragement,, good luck boy.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: RobertGudsin on December 11, 2022, 03:13:10 PMI'm fairly new here , but I don't know who or what else to ask as ive been stuck in panic mode ... I'm losing my home today and considering my car was towed a month ago I'm definitely about to be on my own literally. I don't have many family members never have my whole life so I cannot turn to them . I'm asking if anyone can lend me 20-30 dollars to get me an Uber after I get evicted . I can surely pay it back within 2-3 days I'll give you all my info as in my driver's license my address all of it to assure you I'm legit . something is not clear to me, what kind of security does your driver's license with address information offer if you have lost your home and are moving out of it?if someone were to ask you for that money, you will no longer be at the address on your driver's license, right?
